title: Bank margins likely to remain under pressure in Q2 amid rising deposit costs, say analysts
description: Bank margins may remain under pressure due to higher deposit costs. Loan growth trends will be monitored, especially in the unsecured retail segment. Analysts expect slower growth and higher credit costs for banks with more exposure to microfinance and unsecured loans. Earnings growth for private and PSU banks may vary between 4.1% and 17.2% year-on-year.
